mapper.select: select * from heart where board_id = #{boardId} and member_id=#{memberId}

select DISTINCT b.board_id id,b.title,b.content,m.profile_image writerProfile,s.skill_type skills from heart h join member m on m.member_id = h.member_id join board b on b.board_id = h.board_id join board_skill bs on bs.board_id = b.board_id join skill s on s.skill_id = bs.skill_id where h.member_id = #{memberId}
